mapper.update: UPDATE account_structures SET account_path = #{accountPath}, hierarchy_level = #{hierarchyLevel}, parent_account_code = #{parentAccountCode}, display_order = #{displayOrder}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE account_code = #{accountCode}
mapper.select: SELECT account_code, account_path, hierarchy_level, parent_account_code, display_order, created_at, updated_at FROM account_structures WHERE account_code = #{accountCode}
SELECT account_code, account_path, hierarchy_level, parent_account_code, display_order, created_at, updated_at FROM account_structures ORDER BY account_path ASC, display_order ASC

SELECT account_code, account_path, hierarchy_level, parent_account_code, display_order, created_at, updated_at FROM account_structures WHERE parent_account_code = #{parentAccountCode} ORDER BY display_order ASC, account_code ASC
